author: Titelboim
C2_meta: This study is using a heat plume as a proxy for climate change. Therefore, according to the authors, the external process acting on the communities would be climate change (although I would say the external process is human use of water resources)

comments: The paper is using temperature from heat plumes as a proxy for the effects of climate change and comparing within / outside the plume which is similar to the inside / outside college campus example (intracoupling) so I do no believe this paper should be included.
